affiliate_ads_commission_amount.description: The commission for eligible orders from ads.

affiliate_commission_amount.description: The commission amount charged to the seller for payment to the creator.

affiliate_commission_amount_before_pit.description: The affiliate ads commission paid to a creator before any personal income tax withholding. Applicable only for SEA markets.

affiliate_commission_deposit.description: The amount reserved for creator commissions after an order is paid. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume and is based on the highest earning rate.

affiliate_commission_release.description: The commission deposit refunded to you after order settlement. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume.

affiliate_partner_commission_amount.description: The commission amount for purchases through affiliate partner links.

bonus_cashback_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for participation in the bonus cashback program.

cofunded_creator_bonus_amount.description: The portion of the creator bonus that you co-fund as part of the commission boost campaign.

cofunded_promotion_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for co-funded promotions.

credit_card_handling_fee_amount.description: The handling fee charged when the buyer pays with a credit card.

dt_handling_fee_amount.description: The handling fee charged for orders that are fulfilled by Dilayani Tokopedia.

dynamic_commission_amount.description: The dynamic commission fee is the amount that the platform charges to all sellers for every successfully delivered order. Applicable only for Indonesia.

epr_pob_service_fee_amount.description: The eco-contributions TikTok Shop pays on your behalf to the qualified producer responsibility organization (PRO).

external_affiliate_marketing_fee_amount.description: The service fee for participating in the External Affiliate Marketing Solution Program, as stated during registration.

fee_per_item_sold_amount.description: The fee charged to sellers by the platform for each item sold. Applicable only for the Brazil market.

flash_sales_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for participation in flash sales.

live_specials_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for participation in the [LIVE Specials Programme].

mall_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for using TikTok Shop Mall.

platform_commission_amount.description: The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop.

pre_order_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged when seller joins Pre-order program.

referral_fee_amount.description: The referral fee charged for processing successful orders. Applicable only for the US.

refund_administration_fee_amount.description: The 20% refund administration fee deducted from the total refunded referral fee amount.

seller_paylater_handling_fee_amount.description: The handling fee charged to the seller for participation in the PayLater program.

sfp_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for participation in the [Seller Free Shipping Programme].

tap_shop_ads_commission.description: The advertising commission cost a merchant pays to TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP).

transaction_fee_amount.description: The transaction fee charged for processing successful orders.

tsp_commission_amount.description: The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop Partners (TSP).

vn_fix_infrastructure_fee.description: Infrastructure fees are a fixed service fee that TikTok Shop charges for providing, maintaining, and developing infrastructure for delivery services. It applies to delivered orders on the main order level.

voucher_xtra_service_fee_amount.description: The service fee charged for participation in the Voucher Xtra program.

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyOrderRespo.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

anti_dumping_duty_amount.description: The anti-dumping duties collected by governments for import goods.

customs_clearance_amount.description: The fees charged by logistic suppliers for customs clearance services.  Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

customs_duty_amount.description: The customs duties, a type of tax on cross-border goods collected by governments.  Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

gst_amount.description: The goods and services tax (GST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Singapore, effective January 1, 2023.

import_vat_amount.description: The import VAT, a tax paid on goods bought in one country and imported into another.  Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. In Japan, it refers to the Japan Consumption Tax (JCT).

isr_amount.description: The Mexican federal income tax that TikTok Shop is required to withhold.

iva_amount.description: The Mexican VAT that TikTok Shop is required to withhold on your taxable products and remit to the tax authority.

local_vat_amount.description: The VAT paid by the platform on the seller\'s behalf. Applicable only for local shop orders.

pit_amount.description: The personal income tax (PIT) paid by the platform on the seller\'s behalf.

sst_amount.description: The sales and service tax (SST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Malaysia, effective January 1, 2024.

vat_amount.description: The VAT paid by the platform on the seller\'s behalf.  Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyOrderRespo.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

cod_service_fee_amount.description: The cash on delivery service fees charged to buyers. Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.

refund_cod_service_fee_amount.description: The refund for cash on delivery service fees. Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.

refund_subtotal_before_discount_amount.description: The total price of all refunded items before any seller discounts. This is equivalent to the shop\'s gross sales refund.

seller_discount_amount.description: The total amount of discounts funded by the seller, including: - Seller promotions (Product Discount, Flash Deal, Buy More Save More, Voucher and Bundle Deal) - Seller\'s portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns - Seller discounts during a campaign

seller_discount_refund_amount.description: Discounts returned to the sellers due to returns or refunds.

subtotal_before_discount_amount.description: The total price of all order items before any seller discounts and platform discounts are deducted. This is equivalent to the shop\'s gross sales.

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyOrderRespo.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

actual_shipping_fee_amount.description: The actual shipping fee calculated based on the weight/dimensions measured by the carrier. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`.

customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount.description: The actual shipping fee borne by the customer, calculated based on the product weight uploaded by the seller. Negative numbers refer to the refunded amount of customer-paid shipping fees

exchange_shipping_fee_amount.description: The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods exchange. Applicable only for Indonesia.

failed_delivery_subsidy_amount.description: For shipping fee from failed deliveries, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount.

fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount.description: A reimbursement from TikTok Shop for Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) orders that don\'t qualify for free shipping. Applicable only for the US.

replacement_shipping_fee_amount.description: The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods replacement. Applicable only for Indonesia.

return_shipping_fee_amount.description: The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of returns.

return_shipping_fee_paid_buyer_amount.description: Reimbursement for the shipping fees paid by customers to return packages

return_shipping_label_fee_amount.description: The fee borne by the customer to cover the cost of return labels. This fee is collected on the seller\'s behalf and settled according to the agreed payment terms.

seller_self_shipping_service_fee_amount.description: A service fee charged for orders shipped through your own logistics provider. Applies to packages that don\'t meet the exemption criteria.

shipping_fee_discount_amount.description: The shipping fee subsidies and incentives provided by the platform. This includes all subsidies regardless of fulfillment channels or policies. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`.

shipping_insurance_fee_amount.description: The shipping insurance fee incurred by the seller for purchasing additional TikTok shipping insurance services.

signature_confirmation_fee_amount.description: The fee incurred for packages requiring signature confirmation services

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyOrderRespo.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

customer_shipping_fee_offset_amount.description: The fee to offset TikTok Shop Shipping Incentive or customer-paid shipping fee, resulting in a net charge of $0 to the seller. Applicable only for the US.

fbm_shipping_cost_amount.description: The shipping fee incurred by the seller for using TikTok Shipping. This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.

fbt_fulfillment_fee_amount.description: The shipping and warehouse fulfillment fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`. Applicable only for the US.

fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount.description: (**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `shipping_cost_breakdown.fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount` instead for the relevant details.)

fbt_shipping_cost_amount.description: The shipping fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`. Applicable only for EU and UK.

platform_shipping_fee_discount_amount.description: The shipping fee discount provided in accordance with a campaign policy. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.

promo_shipping_incentive_amount.description: The additional shipping incentive that the seller will receive if the seller signed up for the Co-Funded Free Shipping Program. A negative amount indicates a reversal of incentives due to order refunds attributed to the seller\'s responsibility. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.

refunded_customer_shipping_fee_amount.description: Shipping fee returned to customers due returns and refunds.Does not include subsidies.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

return_refund_subsidy_amount.description: For shipping fee from returns and refunds, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

seller_shipping_fee_discount_amount.description: The shipping fee discount provided by sellers.

shipping_fee_subsidy_amount.description: The shipping fee subsidy funded by the platform for seller shipping. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`. - Positive amount represents a subsidy received by the seller. - Negative amount represents a subsidy that the seller must return to TikTok Shop.

create_time.description: The time when the statement was generated. Unix timestamp.  Statements are generated daily at 00:00 UTC.

currency.description: The three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

id.description: The statement ID.

next_page_token.description: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

payable_amount.description: The final amount paid out after accounting for reserve funds. Formula: total_settlement_amount + total_reserve_amount

status.description: The statement status. Only supports `SETTLED`.

total_count.description: The number of transaction records in the statement.

total_reserve_amount.description: The total amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information. - A positive amount indicates the funds that have been released. - A negative amount indicates the funds being withheld from the settlement.  Applicable only for UK and US local sellers.

total_settlement_amount.description: The total settlement amount.  Formula: total_revenue_amount - total_shipping_cost_amount - total_fee_tax_amount - total_adjustment_amount

transactions.description: The list of transaction records in the statement. Each transaction corresponds to an order, an adjustment, or a reserve-related transaction.

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyStatementR.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

total_adjustment_amount.description: The total adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy.  Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies.

total_fee_tax_amount.description: The total fees and taxes charged by the platform at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded.

total_revenue_amount.description: The total revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the net sales amount.

total_shipping_cost_amount.description: The total shipping costs at the time of order settlement.

Finance202501GetTransactionsbyStatementR.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

adjustment_amount.description: The adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy.  Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies.

adjustment_id.description: The adjustment ID if the transaction is an adjustment. Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID.

adjustment_order_id.description: The order ID associated with the adjustment, if any.

associated_order_id.description: The order ID associated with the reserve transaction.

estimated_release_time.description: The estimated date when the reserve funds will be released and paid out to the seller. Unix timestamp.  Returns an empty value if the reserve funds have already been released.

fee_tax_amount.description: The total fees and taxes charged by TikTok Shop at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `fee_tax_breakdown`.

id.description: The transaction ID.

order_create_time.description: The creation time of the order. Unix timestamp.

order_id.description: The order ID. Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID.

reserve_amount.description: The amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information. - A positive amount indicates funds that have been released. - A negative amount indicates funds being withheld from the settlement.

reserve_id.description: The ID of a reserve transaction.

reserve_status.description: The status of the reserve funds. Possible values: - COLLECTED: A portion of the order\'s settlement amount has been withheld as reserve funds. - RELEASED: The previously reserved funds have been released and paid out to the seller.

revenue_amount.description: The revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all amounts in `revenue_breakdown`.

settlement_amount.description: The settlement amount for the order.  Formula: revenue_amount - shipping_cost_amount - fee_tax_amount - adjustment_amount

shipping_cost_amount.description: The shipping costs at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `shipping_cost_breakdown`.

type.description: The transaction type.  **Standard transactions** - `ORDER`: A transaction related to an order settlement. - `RESERVE`: A transaction involving collection or release of reserve funds. - If the transaction is an adjustment, it returns one of the following values:  **Platform-related adjustments** - `CHARGE_BACK`: Charges returned to a payment card after a customer has successfully disputed an item on their account statement or transactions report. - `CUSTOMER_SERVICE_COMPENSATION`: Extra compensation or compensation paid to a customer after the after-sales period by customer service. - `DEDUCTIONS_INCURRED_BY_SELLER`: Deduction arising from customer dissatisfaction as a result of the seller\'s responsibility. This includes issues such as fraud, empty packages, items that do not match the product display page, or items of lower value than advertised. - `GMV_PAYMENT_FOR_ADS`: Amount used to pay for your advertisement if you are enabled \"auto pay ads with shop GMV\", or to pay for Tiktok Promote ads orders. - `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller. - `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller. - `PLATFORM_PENALTY`: Penalty imposed for a violation of TikTok Shop policies (the corresponding amount has been deducted from the seller\'s account). For details, please refer to the email notification sent to the seller. - `PROMOTION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when a seller takes part in a platform promotion and there are differences between the promotion price and the actual amount paid by the seller. - `REBATE`: A discount on referral fees offered by TikTok Shop to eligible sellers. - `PLATFORM_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller after the seller successfully appealed for a customer dispute. - `PLATFORM_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded under TikTok\'s refund without return policy (the seller is not responsible). - `COFUNDED_CREATOR_REWARDS`: Fees charged for joining the co-funded creator rewards program to reward creator activities.  **Logistics-related adjustments** - `FBT_WAREHOUSE_SERVICE_FEE`: Amount charged by TikTok Fulfillment Portal (Pipak) for warehousing-related bills incurred by the seller under the Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) service. - `LOGISTICS_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded due to logistics-related issues (e.g. lost or damaged order). - `SHIPPING_FEE_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences or mistakes with the shipping fee paid by the seller. - `SHIPPING_FEE_COMPENSATION`: Compensation given to sellers due to differences between the actual shipping fee and the pre-paid shipping fee. - `SHIPPING_FEE_REBATE`: Shipping fee rebate provided to the seller as part of their participation in a platform campaign. - `SAMPLE_SHIPPING_FEE`: Fees charged for sending samples using the TikTok logistics provider. - `SELLER_MISSION_REWARD`: Platform provided cash reward for seller mission completion. - `Violation fee （settlement fee）`: The deduction to cover the cost of buyer\'s losses for the unpleasant experience of the buyer due to an issue that is the seller\'s responsibility. - `Violation fee （credit card）`: The amount owed to TikTok Shop from previous transactions, charged to your primary credit card. - `Bill payment （negative balance）`: The amount you owe TikTok Shop, charged to your primary credit card. -  `Sales proceed（negative balance） `:Sales proceed that is ready to pay for negeative balance. -  `Bill deduction for negative balance `:Deduction for the amount you owe TikTok Shop after all platform fees are deducted from your net earnings.  **Miscellaneous adjustments** `OTHER_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment for other reasons.

currency.description: The three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

est_revenue_amount.description: The estimated revenue amount. This is equivalent to the sum of all amounts in `revenue_breakdown`.

est_settlement_amount.description: The estimated settlement amount for the order. Formula: revenue_amount - shipping_cost_amount - fee_tax_amount - adjustment_amount

Possible return value: - x days after delivery: when order hasn\'t been delivered and only rough settlement policy been provided - Unix timestamp: when order has been delivered and detailed settlement time been calculated out

id.description: The transaction ID.

order_delivery_time.description: The delivery time of the order. Unix timestamp. if order hasn\'t been delivered, no data will be return

order_id.description: The order ID. Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID.

status.description: The transaction status. Only supports `UNSETTLED`.

type.description: The transaction type. Standard transactions - `ORDER`: A transaction related to an order settlement. - If the transaction is an adjustment, it returns one of the following values: Platform-related adjustments - `CHARGE_BACK`: Charges returned to a payment card after a customer has successfully disputed an item on their account statement or transactions report. - `CUSTOMER_SERVICE_COMPENSATION`: Extra compensation or compensation paid to a customer after the after-sales period by customer service. - `DEDUCTIONS_INCURRED_BY_SELLER`: Deduction arising from customer dissatisfaction as a result of the seller\'s responsibility. This includes issues such as fraud, empty packages, items that do not match the product display page, or items of lower value than advertised. - `GMV_PAYMENT_FOR_ADS`: Amount used to pay for your advertisement if you are enabled \"auto pay ads with shop GMV\", or to pay for Tiktok Promote ads orders. - `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller. - `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller. - `PLATFORM_PENALTY`: Penalty imposed for a violation of TikTok Shop policies (the corresponding amount has been deducted from the seller\'s account). For details, please refer to the email notification sent to the seller. - `PROMOTION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when a seller takes part in a platform promotion and there are differences between the promotion price and the actual amount paid by the seller. - `REBATE`: A discount on referral fees offered by TikTok Shop to eligible sellers. - `PLATFORM_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller after the seller successfully appealed for a customer dispute. - `PLATFORM_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded under TikTok\'s refund without return policy (the seller is not responsible). Logistics-related adjustments - `FBT_WAREHOUSE_SERVICE_FEE`: Amount charged by TikTok Fulfillment Portal (Pipak) for warehousing-related bills incurred by the seller under the Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) service. - `LOGISTICS_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded due to logistics-related issues (e.g. lost or damaged order). - `SHIPPING_FEE_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences or mistakes with the shipping fee paid by the seller. - `SHIPPING_FEE_COMPENSATION`: Compensation given to sellers due to differences between the actual shipping fee and the pre-paid shipping fee. - `SHIPPING_FEE_REBATE`: Shipping fee rebate provided to the seller as part of their participation in a platform campaign. - `SAMPLE_SHIPPING_FEE`: Fees charged for sending samples using the TikTok logistics provider. Miscellaneous adjustments `OTHER_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment for other reasons.

unsettled_reason.description: reason for why transaction is pending for settlement

type.description: It will return which type of verification is hit. There are two types of verification: CATEGORY_ITEM_LIMITATION means category verification and TOTAL_COUNT_LIMITATION means total product quantity verification.

create_time.description: Package creation time. Unix timestamp.

delivery_option_id.description: Order delivery option ID. Delivery option ID is mapped to seller configured logistics templates ID.

delivery_option_name.description: Delivery option name. For display purposes only.

handover_method.description: Whether the package is delivered by pick up or drop off. Possible values: - `PICKUP`: A Logistics carrier will pickup the package(s) from the seller\'s pickup address. - `DROP_OFF`: Seller will need to drop off the package(s) to a designated location.

has_multi_skus.description: Whether there are multiple SKU IDs in a package.

last_mile_tracking_number.description: For cross-border order only. Cross-border order last mile tracking number.

note_tag.description: Possible values: - `BUYER_UNNOTED`: The order has not been noted by buyer. - `BUYER_NOTED`: The order has been noted by buyer.

order_line_item_ids.description: The order line item ID contained in the package.

orders.description: The response list of TikTok Shop orders.

package_status.description: Possible values: - `PROCESSING`: Package has been arranged by seller. Waiting for carrier to collect the parcel. - `FULFILLING`: Package has been collected by carrier and in transit. - `COMPLETED`: Package has been delivered. - `CANCELLED`: Package has been canceled. Normally, the package is canceled due to the package being lost or damaged.

shipping_type.description: The method of delivery.  Possible values: - `TIKTOK`: Shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain a shipping label from TikTok. - `SELLER`: Seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller.

split_and_combine_tag.description: Possible values: - `DEFAULT`: The package has not undergone any combine or split operation. - `COMBINE`: The package has been consolidated with another order. - `SPLIT`: The order has been split into multiple orders.

tracking_number.description: Package tracking number.

update_time.description: The time the package has been updated. Unix timestamp.

delivery_type.description: Delivery status of the package. Possible values: - `DELIVERY_SUCCESS`: Package has been successfully delivered. - `DELIVERY_FAILED`: Package delivery has been unsuccessful. - `UPDATE_POD`: For packages that have been delivered, but you would like to update an attachment.

fail_delivery_reason.description: Delivery failure reasons.  When `delivery_type = DELIVERY_FAILED`, this field is required. For other delivery types, this field is not required.  Possible values: - `INVALID_ADDRESS`: The buyer shipping address is invalid. - `UNABLE_RECEIVE`: The buyer is currently unable to receive the delivery. - `UNABLE_CONTACT_BUYER`: Unable to contact the buyer. - `BUYER_REFUSED`: The buyer has refused to receive the product. - `DELAY_DELIVERY`: Delay in delivery. - `PACKAGE_LOST`: The package is lost. - `PACKAGE_DAMAGE`: The package is damaged. - `FORCE_MAJEURE`: An unforeseeable event of force majeure has occurred. - `OTHER`: Other reason.

file_url.description: Attachment URL. The seller can use the [Upload Delivery File](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa6e04a0bb702c06dcd34?external_id=650aa6e04a0bb702c06dcd34#Back%20To%20Top) and [Upload Delivery Image](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa70d0fcef602bf32772f?external_id=650aa70d0fcef602bf32772f) APIs to generate the URL. The attachment will be used by TikTok Shop to verify the package delivery.

handover_method.description: The way you send the first-mile bundle. Possible enumerations are: - `PICKUP`: You use the logistic service provided by TikTok Shop to send the bundle. - `DROP_OFF`: You contact the logistic provider and send the bundle. The logistic provider must be registered at TikTok Shop.

order_ids.description: The IDs of all the orders sent in a single first-mile bundle. The orders must follow the restrictions: - Each of the orders must exist and be RTS and shipping label printed. - The orders are sent by the same seller. - The orders belong to a single group of TikTok Shop service districts. The groups are:   - Group 1: PH, SG, MY, VN, TH, and JP.   - Group 2: DE, FR, IT, ES.  You can not create first mile bundles for US/UK orders using this API.

phone_tail_number.description: Last 4 digits of the sender\'s phone number. Required when `handover_method == DROP_OFF`.

shipping_provider_id.description: The logistic provider ID in TikTok Shop. Required when `handover_method == DROP_OFF`.

tracking_number.description: The logistic tracking number of the bundle. Required when `handover_method == DROP_OFF`.

effect_status.description: Possible values: - ENABLED: All products in stock are available for sale. - DISABLED: All products in stock are unavailable for sale.  - RESTRICTED: The warehouse is either on \"holiday mode\" or \"order limit mode.\" All products in stock are unavailable for sale. -Holiday mode: When the seller cannot fulfill an order from a warehouse, the seller can turn on holiday mode for the warehouse in seller center.  - Order limit mode: When the seller violates TikTok Shop policies, TikTok Shop will limit the order volume that can be fulfilled by a warehouse.

entity_id.description: The warehouse entity ID, used to associate physical information of a warehouse, different warehouses may be associated with the same entity.

id.description: The warehouse ID, a unique and immutable primary key, used for all warehouse logistics.

is_default.description: The default warehouse.  If a product is listed with no designated warehouse, the default warehouse will be used.

name.description: Warehouse name. This name is not unique across the TikTok Shop system.

sub_type.description: Possible values: - DOMESTIC_WAREHOUSE: The warehouse is in the same country as the target market and the seller. - CB_OVERSEA_WAREHOUSE: For cross-border sellers, a local warehouse in the target market.  - CB_DIRECT_SHIPPING_WAREHOUSE: For cross-border sellers, a warehouse in the seller\'s base country, e.g., Mainland China or Hong Kong.

type.description: Possible values: - SALES_WAREHOUSE: Warehouse for shipping products.   - RETURN_WAREHOUSE: Warehouse for receiving returned products.  You can have the same warehouse for both shipping and receiving returns, but they will have different warehouse IDs with the same address.

Logistics202309GetWarehouseListResponseD.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

address_line1.description: The first line of the warehouse address, like street name and street number. Note:  - For Brazilian market, this represents the neighborhood or district. - For the JP market, this represents the district (Chome), block (Banchi), building number (Go).

address_line2.description: The second line of the warehouse address, like flat, apartment, or suit. Note: For the Brazilian market, this represents the street name.

address_line3.description: This represents the street number. If it\'s `s/n`, it means null. Note: Available only in the Brazilian market.

address_line4.description: This represents supplement information, like flat, apartment, or suit (optional). Note: Available only in the Brazilian market.

first_name.description: Kanji first name Applicable only for the JP market.

first_name_local_script.description: Hiragana or Katakana first name Applicable only for the JP market.

full_address.description: The combined warehouse address, including the street address and other address information such as apartment number, building, floor..etc (optional)

last_name.description: Kanji last name Applicable only for the JP market.

last_name_local_script.description: Hiragana or Katakana last name Applicable only for the JP market.

postal_code.description: Warehouse address postal code (also known as zip code)

Order202309GetOrderDetailResponseData.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

auto_combine_group_id.description: An identifier assigned to orders from the same customer during a LIVE session to facilitate combined order shipping when \"auto-combination\" is activated in Seller Center.

buyer_email.description: The anonymized email address of the buyer. It is not recommended to send messages directly to this email address. If you need to contact the buyer, please go to Seller Center - Buyer Messages page.

cancel_order_sla_time.description: The automatic cancellation time for orders specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

cancel_reason.description: The reason for cancelling. [See here](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b28280fcef602bf435096#Back%20To%20Top) for more information.

cancel_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `CANCELLED`.

cancellation_initiator.description: The initiator of a cancellation request. Possible values:  - `SELLER` - `BUYER` - `SYSTEM`

channel_entity_national_registry_id.description: The national channel entity registration ID of payment institution/creditor. In Brazil, it is the CNPJ of payment instituion.

collection_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `IN_TRANSIT` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop

collection_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `IN_TRANSIT`.

commerce_platform.description: The platform where the order was placed. Possible values: - TIKTOK_SHOP - TOKOPEDIA  **Note**: Available only in the Indonesia market.

consultation_id.description: An ID to identify the corresponding ePharmacy consultation.  Applicable only if an ePharmacy consultation was initiated. Not applicable if the prescription was provided by the customer through an image upload.

cpf.description: CPF (invoice number), used to issue an invoice. Exclusive for the Brazil market.

cpf_name.description: Name belonging to the CPF number for the Brazil market.

create_time.description: The date and time that the order was created. Unix timestamp.

delivery_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `DELIVERED` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop.

delivery_option_name.description: Delivery option name. For display purposes only.

delivery_option_required_delivery_time.description: Order should be delivered before this time.

delivery_sla_time.description: Order should arrive by this date to be considered on-time and to avoid late delivery penalties.

delivery_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `DELIVERED`.

delivery_type.description: Indicates whether it is a PickUp DropOff (PUDO) location. The PUDO location is selected by the buyer when placing orders.  - `HOME_DELIVERY`: not a PUDO location - `COLLECTION_POINT`: a PUDO location

exchange_source_order_id.description: If the order is an exchange order, this field returns the original order\'s order ID, from which the exchange order was generated.   Returned only if is_exchange_order = true.  Note: Only available in US and UK.

fast_delivery_program.description: A badge presented on the merchandise to tell the buyer that the seller participates in the fast delivery program, such that the order should arrive in a promised time period. Possible values: - `3_DAY_DELIVERY` Not returned if order did not meet fast delivery program requirements. Note: Applicable only for the US market.

fast_dispatch_sla_time.description: The latest collection time to gain incentives of NDD (Next Day Delivery) project. Unix timestamp Only available in Thailand and Philippines.

fulfillment_priority_level.description: Fulfillment priority value that can be used to prioritize shipping (only available in SEA)  100 = Instant 200 = Sameday 8 Hours  300 = Sameday  400 = Next Day Delivery 500 = Express 600 = Standard 700 = Economy 800 = Cargo

fulfillment_type.description: Fulfillment type.  Only orders with fulfillment type can be shipped by sellers. Possible values: - `FULFILLMENT_BY_SELLER`: a method where sellers fulfill orders directly from their own inventory, without using TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. In this model, the seller is responsible for storing, packaging, and shipping the product to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_TIKTOK`: a service offered by TikTok that enables sellers to send their products to TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. TikTok then takes care of storing, picking, packing, and shipping the products to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_DILAYANI_TOKOPEDIA`: a method where Tokopedia GoTo Logistics provides warehousing and logistics services to sellers and charges a fee for the service.

has_updated_recipient_address.description: Whether the recipient address has been updated. - `false`: no update - `true`: updated

id.description: A unique identifier for a TikTok Shop order.

is_buyer_request_cancel.description: True when the buyer has a pending cancellation request

is_cod.description: This option is for sellers that accept cash payment on delivery which is rare. Buyers will pay in cash upon receipt of package. Default value is `FALSE`. Only applicable to countries where Cash on Delivery (COD) is supported.

is_exchange_order.description: When TRUE, this is an exchange order.  Note: Only available in US and UK.

is_on_hold_order.description: Indicates whether the order experienced or will be experienced `ON_HOLD` status.

is_replacement_order.description: When true, this is a replacement order.

is_sample_order.description: Use this field to determine whether the order is a sample order.

need_upload_invoice.description: Whether an invoice needs to be uploaded and uploaded status (only for Brazil market). - UNKNOWN:  Currently unable to confirm whether an invoice is needed - NEED_INVOICE: This order requires an invoice and the invoice has not been uploaded yet - NO_NEED：This order does not require an invoice - INVOICE_UPLOADED: The invoice for this order has been uploaded and verified. If the order is split, it will be marked as \"uploaded\" once any sub-order\'s invoice is uploaded. - INVOICE_PROCESSING: The invoice for this order is currently being uploaded/cancelled. Please wait for the final result and do not repeat the operation

order_type.description: The order type. Possible values based on region:  **All regions** - `ZERO_LOTTERY`: An order placed during a lottery event in TikTok LIVE.  **US** - `PRE_ORDER`: An advance order for items that are not yet available or released. Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An order for items that are produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced. - `BACK_ORDER`: An order for items that are out of stock but expected to be restocked. Fulfillment starts after the product is restocked.  Returns an empty value for standard orders or other types that don\'t fall into the above categories.

packages.description: List of packages included in this order

paid_time.description: The date and time that the order was paid. Unix timestamp.

payment_auth_code.description: Authorization code of current transaction (only for the Brazilian market). For card transactions (credit/debit card), this field will be transaction authorization code. For PIX transactions, this field will be E2E ID.

payment_card_type.description: Code to distinguish different payment method. Only assigned when the payment method is using bank card. Possible values are: Debit, Credit, Prepaid

payment_method_code.description: Payment method code identifying current transaction. It will contains payment method and card brand if it is card transaction.

payment_method_name.description: Payment method name, only for display

pick_up_cut_off_time.description: To avoid LDR, you must ensure the package is picked up by this time. Only applicable in Southeast Asia regions.

recommended_shipping_time.description: Recommended time to ship based on the each LSP service type (only available in SEA)

release_date.description: The date on which order handling starts and the status of the order changes to [`AWAITING_SHIPMENT`](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b1b4bbace3e02b76d1011).  Applicable only if the `order_type` is `PRE_ORDER`.

replaced_order_id.description: The order ID for the order that is being replaced. Returned only if `is_replacement_order` = `true`

rts_sla_time.description: The latest shipping time specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

rts_time.description: The time seller shipped the order (call Ship Order endpoint successfully). Unix timestamp.

seller_note.description: This field return the note, which seller notes in TikTok Seller Center.

shipping_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `AWAITING_COLLECTION` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop.

shipping_provider.description: The name of the current shipping provider.

shipping_provider_id.description: The ID of the current shipping provider.

shipping_type.description: The method of delivery. - `TIKTOK`: shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain shipping label from TikTok. - `SELLER`: seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller.

split_or_combine_tag.description: Indicate whether the order is combined or split.  - `COMBINED` - `SPLIT`  This field will be used in future fulfillment apis.

status.description: The order status. Possible values: - `UNPAID`: The order is placed, but payment is not yet completed. - `ON_HOLD`: The order is accepted and is waiting for fulfillment so the buyer may still cancel without the seller’s approval. If `order_type=PRE_ORDER`, it also means the product is still awaiting release so payment will only be authorized 1 day before the release, but the seller should start preparing for the release. - `AWAITING_SHIPMENT`: The order is ready for shipment, but no items are shipped yet. - `PARTIALLY_SHIPPING`: Some items in the order are shipped, but not all. - `AWAITING_COLLECTION`: The shipment is arranged, but the package is waiting to be collected by the carrier. - `IN_TRANSIT`: The package is collected by the carrier and delivery is in progress. - `DELIVERED`: The package is delivered to buyer. - `COMPLETED`: The order is completed, and no further returns or refunds are allowed. - `CANCELLED`: The order is cancelled.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number. Available after ship package.

tts_sla_time.description: The latest collection time specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

update_time.description: Time of order status changes. Unix timestamp.

warehouse_id.description: seller warehouse ID.

type.description: Indicates if the duration is calculated in calendar days or business days. Possible values: - `CALENDAR_DAY`: Represents consecutive days, including weekends and holidays. - `BUSINESS_DAY`: Represents business days, excluding weekends and public holidays. Default: `BUSINESS_DAY`

Order202309GetOrderDetailResponseDataOrd.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

buyer_service_fee.description: A service fee is charged on every transaction made. The charge is applied from the fifth order onwards and collected directly from customers during checkout. Only available in Indonesia market.

cancel_user.description: The initiator of a cancellation request: - `BUYER` - `SELLER` - `OPERATOR` - `SYSTEM`

combined_listing_skus.description: For a virtual bundle SKU, returns an array of related product SKUs that compose the virtual bundle SKU.

display_status.description: - `UNPAID`: The order is placed, but payment is not yet completed. - `AWAITING_SHIPMENT`: The order is ready for shipment, but no items are shipped yet. - `AWAITING_COLLECTION`:  The shipment is arranged, but the package is waiting to be collected by the carrier. - `IN_TRANSIT`: The package is collected by the carrier and delivery is in progress. - `DELIVERED`: The package is delivered to buyer. - `COMPLETED`: The order is completed, and no further returns or refunds are allowed. - `CANCELLED`: The order is canceled.

handling_duration_days.description: [**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. Use `handling_duration` instead.]  The number of business days required for the seller to process the order and hand it over to a shipping carrier after the order is placed.  Applicable only if the value for `sku_type` is `MADE_TO_ORDER`.

id.description: Line item ID.

is_dangerous_good.description: Whether the SKU is a hazmat item. When creating the label for a hazmat item, you must follow the platform rules to put certain items into one package. Please refer to the relationship between `sku_id` and `package_id` to determine how to follow platform rules.

is_gift.description: Indicates whether the current order line is a gift.

needs_prescription.description: A flag to indicate whether the included product requires a prescription.

original_price.description: Item original price, please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

package_id.description: An order can contain one more more packages based on how the seller chooses to ship. Each package has a unique `package_id` (and also a `tracking_id`, which is used to track the progress of the package as it is shipped). For local sellers in the US and UK markets, the `package_id` and `package_status` property will not be returned before the package is shipped

package_status.description: The package status of the item: - `TO_FULFILL`: package waiting seller to arrange shipment. - `PROCESSING`: package shipment has been arranged by seller. Waiting carrier to collect the parcel. - `FULFILLING`: package has been collected by carrier and in transit. - `COMPLETED`: package has been delivered. - `CANCELLED`: package has been canceled. Normally, the package is canceled due to the package being lost or damaged.

pfand_fee.description: Deposit fee that is applied to certain products, typically beverage containers such as bottles or cans. **Note** Only available in Germany market

platform_discount.description: Platform discount amount, please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

product_id.description: Product ID.

retail_delivery_fee.description: RDF (retail delivery fee). Available only in the US market.

rts_time.description: The time seller shipped line order (call Ship Order endpoint successfully). Unix timestamp.

sale_price.description: Item sale price, please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

seller_discount.description: Seller discount amount. Please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

seller_sku.description: The seller stock keeping unit (SKU) of the item.

shipping_provider_id.description: The shipping provider ID of the item.

shipping_provider_name.description: The shipping provider name of the item.

sku_id.description: SKU ID.

sku_name.description: The name of the SKU, combined by product SKU attribute like size or color. For example, \"Black, 26.\"

sku_type.description: [**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. Use `order_type` instead.]  The order line type: Possible values based on region:  **All regions** - `NORMAL`: An item that is in stock and available for immediate purchase and fulfillment. - `ZERO_LOTTERY:` An item purchased during a lottery event in TikTok LIVE. - `SHOP_PARTNER`: An item purchased from a TikTok Shop partner store.  **US** - `PRE_ORDER`: An item that is not yet available or released. Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An item that is produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number. Available after package has been shipped.

id.description: Package ID

Order202309GetOrderDetailResponseDataOrd.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

buyer_service_fee.description: A service fee is charged on every transaction made. The charge is applied from the fifth order onwards and collected directly from customers during checkout. Only available in Indonesia market.

handling_fee.description: A fee charged to buyers to cover the additional processing/handling costs associated with the chosen payment method. Only available in the Indonesia market.

item_insurance_fee.description: The cost incurred by the buyers for coverage against defects or damage to the product after purchase.  **Note**: Available only in the Indonesia market.

original_total_product_price.description: Total original price of products (VAT included for crossborder shop).  For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.

product_tax.description: The tax on the total item price.

retail_delivery_fee.description: RDF (retail delivery fee). Available only in the US market.

shipping_fee.description: Buyer paid shipping fee.   `shipping_fee` = `original_shipping_fee` - `shipping_fee_seller_discount` - `shipping_fee_platform_discount`  For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.

shipping_fee_cofunded_discount.description: Shipping fee discount provided by seller, eligible for co-funded reimbursement upon order delivery, based on Co-Funded Free Shipping program terms. **Note**: This will be 0 for orders that did not meet minimum order value for co-funded reimbursement. In this case, refer to `shipping_fee_seller_discount` for the shipping discount the buyer received.

shipping_fee_seller_discount.description: Shipping fee discount provided by seller for an order that will not qualify for co-funded reimbursement. **Note**: If an order meets the minimum order value for co-funded reimbursement, this will be 0. In this case, refer to `shipping_fee_cofunded_discount` for the shipping discount the buyer received.

shipping_fee_tax.description: The tax on the shipping price.

shipping_insurance_fee.description: The cost incurred by the buyers for coverage against loss or damage to goods during transit.  **Note**: Available only in the Indonesia market.

small_order_fee.description: Small order fee for TH. Small order fee is for Thailand only. small order fee means that the platform will set a minimum order spending amount, when the order amount is lower than the minimum order spending amount, the user needs to pay small order fee to meet the platform minimum spending amount.   e.g. Minimum order spending amount is 100, order amount is 80. So the small order fee will be 20.

sub_total.description: Buyer paid subtotal of all the SKUs in the order. For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.  `sub_total` = `original_total_product_price` - `seller_discount` - `platform_discount`

tax.description: Buyer paid total taxes of the order. Applicable to crossborder shops and the US market.

address_line1.description: The first line of the street address.

address_line2.description: The second line of the street address

address_line3.description: The third line of the street address.  Applicable only for the BR market.

address_line4.description: The fourth line of the street address. Applicable only for the BR market.

first_name.description: The first name of the recipient. If the buyer does not provide their first and last name separately, this parameter will have the same value as the \"name\" parameter.   **Note**: Applicable only for the US, UK, and JP markets.

first_name_local_script.description: Recipient first name in katakana. **Note**: Applicable only for the JP market.

last_name.description: The last name of the recipient. If the buyer does not provide their first and last name separately, this parameter will be empty.   **Note**: Applicable only for the US, UK, and JP markets.

last_name_local_script.description: Recipient last name in katakana. **Note**: Applicable only for the JP market.

name.description: The name of the recipient. Please note, if this order uses platform logistics, recipient name will be desensitized

phone_number.description: The telephone number of the buyer. Please notice, if this order uses platform logistics, phone number will be desensitized.

post_town.description: Post town of the address Note: Available only in UK market

postal_code.description: The postal code that can be used by seller for shipping (in the U.S, this is the ZIP code).

drop_off_location.description: Drop-off location selected by the buyer.

address_level.description: Administrative district level code. Value can be L0/L1/L2/L3/L4. eg. US is L0

address_level_name.description: The name of administrative division that can be used by seller for ship. e.g. state/county/city/district/town etc.

Order202309GetOrderDetailResponseDataOrd.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

create_time_ge.description: Filter orders to show only those that are created on or after the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.  Note: `create_time_ge` and `create_time_lt` together constitute the creation time filter condition. - If `create_time_ge` is filled but `create_time_lt` is empty, `create_time_lt` will default to the current time. - If `create_time_lt` is filled but `create_time_ge` is empty, `create_time_ge` will default to the earliest shop time.

create_time_lt.description: Filter orders to show only those that are created before the specified date and time. Unix timestamp. Refer to notes in `create_time_ge` for more usage information.

is_buyer_request_cancel.description: Whether the buyer has initiated an order cancellation request.

order_status.description: Specific order status. Available values: - `UNPAID`: The order has been placed, but payment has not been completed. - `ON_HOLD`: The order has been accepted and is awaiting fulfillment. The buyer may still cancel without the seller’s approval. If `order_type=PRE_ORDER`, the product is still awaiting release so payment will only be authorized 1 day before the release, but the seller should start preparing for the release. - `AWAITING_SHIPMENT`: The order is ready to be shipped, but no items have been shipped yet. - `PARTIALLY_SHIPPING`: Some items in the order have been shipped, but not all. - `AWAITING_COLLECTION`: Shipping has been arranged, but the package is waiting to be collected by the carrier. - `IN_TRANSIT`: The package has been collected by the carrier and delivery is in progress. - `DELIVERED`: The package has been delivered to the buyer. - `COMPLETED`: The order has been completed, and no further returns or refunds are allowed. - `CANCELLED`: The order has been cancelled.

shipping_type.description: The delivery method. - `TIKTOK`: Shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain a shipping label from TikTok. - `SELLER`: Seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller.

update_time_ge.description: Filter orders to show only those that are updated on or after the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.  Note: `update_time_ge` and `update_time_lt` together define the update time filter condition. - If `update_time_ge` is filled but `update_time_lt` is empty, `update_time_lt` will default to the current time. - If `update_time_lt` is filled but `update_time_ge` is empty, `update_time_ge` will default to the earliest shop time.

update_time_lt.description: Filter orders to show only those that are updated before the specified date and time. Unix timestamp. Refer to notes in `update_time_ge` for more usage information.

warehouse_ids.description: Filter orders by pickup/sales warehouse IDs. Applicable only if the multi-warehouse feature is enabled. Max count: 100

code.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

message.description: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

next_page_token.description: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

total_count.description: Total number of orders in the search result.

Order202309GetOrderListResponseData.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

auto_combine_group_id.description: An identifier assigned to orders from the same customer during a LIVE session to facilitate combined order shipping when \"auto-combination\" is activated in Seller Center.

buyer_email.description: The anonymized email address of the buyer. It is not recommended to send messages directly to this email address. If you need to contact the buyer, please go to the TikTok Shop Seller Center - Buyer Messages page.

cancel_order_sla_time.description: The automatic cancellation time for orders specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

cancel_reason.description: The cancellation reason. Please visit [our list of cancel reasons](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e61eee427345048595487d) for more information.

cancel_time.description: The time an order\'s status was updated to `CANCELLED`. Unix timestamp.

collection_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `IN_TRANSIT` before this time, the order will be canceled by TikTok Shop. Unix timestamp.

collection_time.description: The time an order\'s status has been updated to `IN_TRANSIT`. Unix timestamp.

commerce_platform.description: The platform where the order was placed. Possible values: - `TIKTOK_SHOP` - `TOKOPEDIA`  **Note**: Available only in the Indonesia market.

consultation_id.description: An ID to identify the corresponding ePharmacy consultation.  Applicable only if an ePharmacy consultation was initiated. Not applicable if the prescription was provided by the customer through an image upload.

cpf.description: CPF (invoice number), used to issue an invoice.  **Note**: Only available in the Brazil market.

cpf_name.description: Name belonging to the CPF number for the Brazil market.

create_time.description: The date and time that the order was created. Unix timestamp.

delivery_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `DELIVERED` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop. Unix timestamp.

delivery_option_id.description: Delivery option ID is mapped to seller configured logistics templates ID.

delivery_option_name.description: Delivery option name. For display purposes only. Available values: - `Economy Shipping` - `Standard Shipping` - `Express Shipping`

delivery_option_required_delivery_time.description: Order should be delivered before this time. Unix timestamp.

delivery_sla_time.description: Order should arrive by this date to be considered on-time and to avoid late delivery penalties.

delivery_time.description: The time an order\'s status changed to `DELIVERED`. Unix timestamp.

delivery_type.description: Indicates whether it is a Pick-Up Drop-Off (PUDO) location. The PUDO location is selected by the buyer when placing orders. Available values: - `HOME_DELIVERY`: not a PUDO location - `COLLECTION_POINT`: a PUDO location

exchange_source_order_id.description: If the order is an exchange order, this field returns the original order\'s order ID, from which the exchange order was generated.   Returned only if is_exchange_order = true.  Note: Only available in US and UK.

fast_delivery_program.description: A badge presented on the merchandise to tell the buyer that the seller participates in the fast delivery program, such that the order should arrive in a promised time period. Possible values: - `3_DAY_DELIVERY` Not returned if order did not meet fast delivery program requirements. Note: Applicable only for the US market.

fast_dispatch_sla_time.description: The latest collection time to gain incentives of NDD (Next Day Delivery) project. Unix timestamp.  **Note**: Only available in Thailand and the Philippines.

fulfillment_priority_level.description: Fulfillment priority value that can be used to prioritize shipping (only available in SEA)  100 = Instant 200 = Sameday 8 Hours  300 = Sameday  400 = Next Day Delivery 500 = Express 600 = Standard 700 = Economy 800 = Cargo

fulfillment_type.description: Fulfillment type. Only orders with fulfillment type can be shipped by sellers. Available values: - `FULFILLMENT_BY_SELLER`: a method where sellers fulfill orders directly from their own inventory, without using TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. In this model, the seller is responsible for storing, packaging, and shipping the products to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_TIKTOK`: a service offered by TikTok where sellers can send their products to TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. TikTok then takes care of storing, picking, packing, and shipping the products to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_DILAYANI_TOKOPEDIA`: a method where Tokopedia GoTo Logistics provides warehousing and logistics services to sellers and charges a fee for the service.

has_updated_recipient_address.description: Whether the recipient address has been updated or changed.

id.description: TikTok Shop order ID.

is_buyer_request_cancel.description: Whether the buyer has a pending cancellation request.

is_cod.description: This option is for sellers that accept cash payment on delivery (COD). Buyers will pay in cash upon receiving the package.   Default: FALSE  Only applicable to countries where COD is supported.

is_exchange_order.description: When TRUE, this is an exchange order.  Note: Only available in US and UK.

is_on_hold_order.description: Indicates whether the order has been changed to or will be updated to `ON_HOLD` status.

is_replacement_order.description: Whether this is a replacement order.

is_sample_order.description: Use this field to determine whether the order is a sample order.

need_upload_invoice.description: Whether an invoice needs to be uploaded and uploaded status (only for Brazil market). - UNKNOWN:  Currently unable to confirm whether an invoice is needed - NEED_INVOICE: This order requires an invoice and the invoice has not been uploaded yet - NO_NEED：This order does not require an invoice - INVOICE_UPLOADED: The invoice for this order has been uploaded and verified. If the order is split, it will be marked as \"uploaded\" once any sub-order\'s invoice is uploaded. - INVOICE_PROCESSING: The invoice for this order is currently being uploaded/cancelled. Please wait for the final result and do not repeat the operation

order_type.description: The order type. Possible values based on region:  **All regions** - `ZERO_LOTTERY`: An order placed during a lottery event in TikTok LIVE.  **US** - `PRE_ORDER`: An advance order for items that are not yet available or released. Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An order for items that are produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced. - `BACK_ORDER`: An order for items that are out of stock but expected to be restocked. Fulfillment starts after the product is restocked.  Returns an empty value for standard orders or other types that don\'t fall into the above categories.

platform_discount.description: Platform discount amount. Please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

product_id.description: Product ID.

retail_delivery_fee.description: Retail delivery fee (RDF).   **Note**: Only available in the US market.

rts_time.description: The time sellers shipped the order (called [Ship Package API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa4f1defece02be6e7cb1) successfully). Unix timestamp.

sale_price.description: Item sale price. Please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

seller_discount.description: Seller discount amount. Please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

seller_sku.description: The seller stock keeping unit (SKU) of the item.

shipping_provider_id.description: The shipping provider ID of the item.

sku_id.description: SKU ID.

sku_name.description: The name of the SKU, combined by product SKU attribute like size or color. e.g. \"Black, 26\"

sku_type.description: [**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. Use `order_type` instead.]  The order line type. Possible values based on region:  **All regions** - `NORMAL`: An item that is in stock and available for immediate purchase and fulfillment. - `ZERO_LOTTERY`: An item purchased during a lottery event in TikTok LIVE. - `SHOP_PARTNER`: An item purchased from a TikTok Shop partner store.  **US** - `PRE_ORDER`: An item that is not yet available or released. Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An item that is produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number. Available after package has been shipped.

Order202309GetOrderListResponseDataOrder.description: tiktok shop openapi sdk for apis  The version of the OpenAPI document: 1.0.0

buyer_service_fee.description: A service fee is charged on every transaction made. The charge is applied from the fifth order onwards and collected directly from customers during checkout. Only available in the Indonesia market.

handling_fee.description: A fee charged to the buyer to cover the additional processing, handling, and/or installment costs associated with the chosen payment method.

item_insurance_fee.description: The cost incurred by the buyers for coverage against defects or damage to the product after purchase.  **Note**: Only available in the US and Indonesia markets.

original_total_product_price.description: Total original price of the products (VAT included for cross-border shops).  For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.

product_tax.description: The tax on the total item price.

retail_delivery_fee.description: Retail delivery fee (RDF).   **Note**: Only available in the US market.

shipping_fee.description: Buyer paid shipping fee.   `shipping_fee = original_shipping_fee - shipping_fee_seller_discount - shipping_fee_platform_discount`  For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.

shipping_fee_cofunded_discount.description: Shipping fee discount provided by seller, eligible for co-funded reimbursement upon order delivery, based on Co-Funded Free Shipping program terms. **Note**: This will be 0 for orders that did not meet minimum order value for co-funded reimbursement. In this case, refer to `shipping_fee_seller_discount` for the shipping discount the buyer received.

shipping_fee_platform_discount.description: Shipping fee discount provided by platform.

shipping_fee_seller_discount.description: Shipping fee discount provided by seller for an order that will not qualify for co-funded reimbursement. **Note**: If an order meets the minimum order value for co-funded reimbursement, this will be 0. In this case, refer to `shipping_fee_cofunded_discount` for the shipping discount the buyer received.

shipping_fee_tax.description: The tax on the shipping price.

shipping_insurance_fee.description: The cost incurred by the buyer for coverage against loss or damage to goods during transit.  **Note**: Only available in the Indonesia market.

small_order_fee.description: Small order fee for TH (**Thailand market only**).   Small order fee means that the platform will set a minimum order spending amount. When the order amount is lower than the minimum order spending amount, the user needs to pay a small order fee to meet the platform minimum spending amount.   e.g. Minimum order spending amount is 100, order amount is 80. So the small order fee will be 20.

sub_total.description: Buyer paid sub-total of all the SKUs in the order.  `sub_total = original_total_product_price - seller_discount - platform_discount`  For the US market, this is pre-tax total amount.

tax.description: Buyer paid total taxes for the order. Applicable to both cross-border shops and the US market.

total_amount.description: Buyer paid total payment.  `total_amount = sub_total + shipping_fee + taxes + retail_delivery_fee`

postal_code.description: The postal code that can be used by seller for shipping. For the US market, this refers to the ZIP Code.

cod_fee_net_amount.description: COD fee charged by shipping aggregators including tax. For regions outside of Saudi Arabia, the value is `0.00`.

line_items.description: Each object is the same as the \"data\" field (line 5) without \"line_items\"

subtotal_deduction_seller.description: Seller provided price discount on the product

voucher_deduction_seller.description: Type of the seller-providing discount on the product. Possible values: `1010000`: PLATFORM_NEW_USER, `1020000`: SELLER_SKU_PRICE, `1030000`: PLATFORM_FREE_SHIPPING`

auto_combine_group_id.description: An identifier assigned to orders from the same customer during a LIVE session to facilitate combined order shipping when \"auto-combination\" is activated in Seller Center.

buyer_email.description: The anonymized email address of the buyer. It is not recommended to send messages directly to this email address. If you need to contact the buyer, please go to Seller Center - Buyer Messages page.

cancel_order_sla_time.description: The automatic cancellation time for orders specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

cancel_reason.description: The reason for cancelling. [See here](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b28280fcef602bf435096#Back%20To%20Top) for more information.

cancel_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `CANCELLED`.

cancellation_initiator.description: The initiator of a cancellation request. Possible values:  - `SELLER` - `BUYER` - `SYSTEM`

channel_entity_national_registry_id.description: The national channel entity registration ID  of payment institution/creditor. In Brazil, it is the CNPJ of payment instituion.

collection_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `IN_TRANSIT` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop

collection_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `IN_TRANSIT`.

commerce_platform.description: The platform where the order was placed. Possible values: - TIKTOK_SHOP - TOKOPEDIA **Note**: Available only in the Indonesia market.

consultation_id.description: An ID to identify the corresponding ePharmacy consultation.  Applicable only if an ePharmacy consultation was initiated. Not applicable if the prescription was provided by the customer through an image upload.

cpf.description: CPF (invoice number), used to issue an invoice. Exclusive for the Brazil market.

cpf_name.description: Name belonging to the CPF number for the Brazil market.

create_time.description: The date and time that the order was created. Unix timestamp.

delivery_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `DELIVERED` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop.

delivery_option_name.description: Delivery option name. For display purposes only.

delivery_option_required_delivery_time.description: Order should be delivered before this time.

delivery_sla_time.description: Order should arrive by this date to be considered on-time and to avoid late delivery penalties.

delivery_time.description: The timestamp of the order\'s status update to `DELIVERED`.

delivery_type.description: Indicates whether it is a PickUp DropOff (PUDO) location. The PUDO location is selected by the buyer when placing orders.  - `HOME_DELIVERY`: not a PUDO location - `COLLECTION_POINT`: a PUDO location

exchange_source_order_id.description: If the order is an exchange order, this field returns the original order\'s order ID, from which the exchange order was generated.  Returned only if is_exchange_order = true. Note: Only available in US and UK.

fast_delivery_program.description: A badge presented on the merchandise to tell the buyer that the seller participates in the fast delivery program, such that the order should arrive in a promised time period. Possible values: - `3_DAY_DELIVERY` Not returned if order did not meet fast delivery program requirements. Note: Applicable only for the US market.

fast_dispatch_sla_time.description: The latest collection time to gain incentives of NDD (Next Day Delivery) project. Unix timestamp Only available in Thailand and Philippines.

fulfillment_type.description: Fulfillment type.  Only orders with fulfillment type can be shipped by sellers. Possible values: - `FULFILLMENT_BY_SELLER`: a method where sellers fulfill orders directly from their own inventory, without using TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. In this model, the seller is responsible for storing, packaging, and shipping the product to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_TIKTOK`: a service offered by TikTok that enables sellers to send their products to TikTok\'s fulfillment centers. TikTok then takes care of storing, picking, packing, and shipping the products to customers. - `FULFILLMENT_BY_DILAYANI_TOKOPEDIA`: a method where Tokopedia GoTo Logistics provides warehousing and logistics services to sellers and charges a fee for the service.

has_updated_recipient_address.description: Whether the recipient address has been updated. - `false`: no update - `true`: updated

id.description: A unique identifier for a TikTok Shop order.

is_buyer_request_cancel.description: True when the buyer has a pending cancellation request

is_cod.description: This option is for sellers that accept cash payment on delivery which is rare. Buyers will pay in cash upon receipt of package. Default value is `FALSE`. Only applicable to countries where Cash on Delivery (COD) is supported.

is_exchange_order.description: When TRUE, this is an exchange order. Note: Only available in US and UK.

is_on_hold_order.description: Indicates whether the order experienced or will be experienced `ON_HOLD` status.

is_replacement_order.description: When true, this is a replacement order.

is_sample_order.description: Use this field to determine whether the order is a sample order.

need_upload_invoice.description: Whether an invoice needs to be uploaded (only for Brazil market). - `UNKNOWN` - `NEED_INVOICE` - `NO_NEED` - `INVOICE_UPLOADED`

order_type.description: The order type. Possible values based on region: **All regions** - `ZERO_LOTTERY`: An order placed during a lottery event in TikTok LIVE. **US** - `PRE_ORDER`: An advance order for items that are not yet available or released. Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An order for items that are produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced. - `BACK_ORDER`: An order for items that are out of stock but expected to be restocked. Fulfillment starts after the product is restocked. Returns an empty value for standard orders or other types that don\'t fall into the above categories.

packages.description: List of packages included in this order

paid_time.description: The date and time that the order was paid. Unix timestamp.

payment_auth_code.description: Authorization code of current transaction (only for the Brazilian market). For card transactions (credit/debit card), this field will be transaction authorization code. For PIX transactions, this field will be E2E ID.

payment_card_type.description: Code to distinguish different payment method. Only assigned when the payment method is using bank card. Possible values are: Debit, Credit, Prepaid

payment_method_code.description: Payment method code identifying current transaction. It will contains payment method and card brand if it is card transaction.

payment_method_name.description: Payment method name, only for display

pick_up_cut_off_time.description: To avoid LDR, you must ensure the package is picked up by this time. Only applicable in Southeast Asia regions.

release_date.description: The date on which order handling starts and the status of the order changes to [`AWAITING_SHIPMENT`](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b1b4bbace3e02b76d1011). Applicable only if the `order_type` is `PRE_ORDER`.

replaced_order_id.description: The order ID for the order that is being replaced. Returned only if `is_replacement_order` = `true`

rts_sla_time.description: The latest shipping time specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

rts_time.description: The time seller shipped the order (call Ship Order endpoint successfully). Unix timestamp.

seller_note.description: This field return the note, which seller notes in TikTok Seller Center.

shipping_due_time.description: If the order hasn\'t updated its status to `AWAITING_COLLECTION` before this time, the order will be automatically canceled by TikTok Shop.

shipping_provider.description: The name of the current shipping provider.

shipping_provider_id.description: The ID of the current shipping provider.

shipping_type.description: The method of delivery. - `TIKTOK`: shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain shipping label from TikTok. - `SELLER`: seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller.

split_or_combine_tag.description: Indicate whether the order is combined or split. - `COMBINED` - `SPLIT` This field will be used in future fulfillment apis.

status.description: The order status. Possible values: - `UNPAID`: The order is placed, but payment is not yet completed. - `ON_HOLD`: The order is accepted and is waiting for fulfillment so the buyer may still cancel without the seller’s approval. If `order_type=PRE_ORDER`, it also means the product is still awaiting release so payment will only be authorized 1 day before the release, but the seller should start preparing for the release. - `AWAITING_SHIPMENT`: The order is ready for shipment, but no items are shipped yet. - `PARTIALLY_SHIPPING`: Some items in the order are shipped, but not all. - `AWAITING_COLLECTION`: The shipment is arranged, but the package is waiting to be collected by the carrier. - `IN_TRANSIT`: The package is collected by the carrier and delivery is in progress. - `DELIVERED`: The package is delivered to buyer. - `COMPLETED`: The order is completed, and no further returns or refunds are allowed. - `CANCELLED`: The order is cancelled.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number. Available after ship package.

tts_sla_time.description: The latest collection time specified by the platform. Unix timestamp.

update_time.description: Time of order status changes. Unix timestamp.

warehouse_id.description: seller warehouse ID.

needs_prescription.description: A flag to indicate whether the included product requires a prescription.

original_price.description: Item original price, please refer to the currency of `payment_info`.

For local sellers in the US and UK markets, the `package_id` and `package_status` property will not be returned before the package is shipped

Fulfillment starts on a specific date in the future. - `MADE_TO_ORDER`: An item that is produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment starts after the product is produced.
